welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Willow Street, USA! We're thrilled to have you here in our charming city known for its quaint shops, delicious food, and friendly community. We can't wait for you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport is a small but modern facility, offering a range of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Harrisburg International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Harrisburg International Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi access is free for all passengers.
